mapper.select: SELECT P.POLICY_NO ,CASE WHEN P.EXPIRE_DATE < GETDATE()+1 THEN '50' ELSE P.STATUS END STATUS ,P.EFFECTIVE_DATE ,P.EXPIRE_DATE ,P.PAID_TO_DATE ,P.PAYMENT_MODE ,P.MAIN_AMOUNT ,P.PREM_YEAR ,P.CURRENCY ,LIPM_ID ,ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(PM.LIPM_NAME_1) LIPM_NAME_1 ,LIPI_ID ,ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(PI.LIPI_NAME) LIPI_NAME ,PI.LIPI_MAIN_AMT ,PROD.PRODUCT_NAME FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY P JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM PM ON PM.LIPM_INSU_NO = P.POLICY_NO JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPI PI ON PI.LIPI_INSU_NO = P.POLICY_NO JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.PRODUCT PROD ON PROD.PRODUCT_CODE = PM.LIPM_INSU_TYPE WHERE P.POLICY_NO = #{policyNo} AND PM.LIPM_ID = #{rocId}

SELECT P.POLICY_NO ,CASE WHEN P.EXPIRE_DATE < GETDATE()+1 THEN '50' ELSE P.STATUS END STATUS ,P.EFFECTIVE_DATE ,P.EXPIRE_DATE ,P.PAID_TO_DATE ,P.PAYMENT_MODE ,P.MAIN_AMOUNT ,P.PREM_YEAR ,P.CURRENCY ,LIPM_ID ,ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(PM.LIPM_NAME_1) LIPM_NAME_1 ,LIPI_ID ,ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(PI.LIPI_NAME) LIPI_NAME ,PI.LIPI_MAIN_AMT ,PROD.PRODUCT_NAME ,T.TRANS_TYPE FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY P LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM PM ON PM.LIPM_INSU_NO = P.POLICY_NO LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPI PI ON PI.LIPI_INSU_NO = P.POLICY_NO LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.PRODUCT PROD ON PROD.PRODUCT_CODE = PM.LIPM_INSU_TYPE AND P.EFFECTIVE_DATE BETWEEN DESI_SALE_DATE AND DESI_CHAN_VAR_DATE LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY TP ON TP.POLICY_NO = PM.LIPM_INSU_NO RIGHT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS T ON T.TRANS_NUM = TP.TRANS_NUM WHERE T.TRANS_NUM = #{transNum} OR T.TRANS_NUM = (SELECT TOP 1 TRANS_NUM FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_MERGE WHERE TRANS_NUM_MERGE = #{transNum})
